def jsonRes = messageExchange.getResponse().contentAsString
def jsonSlurper = new groovy.json.JsonSlurper(); def parse = jsonSlurper.parseText(jsonRes)
def shipCode = parse.chargesAndFees.shipCode log.info shipCode assert shipCode == "AX"
def itineraryCode = parse.chargesAndFees.itineraryCode log.info itineraryCode assert itineraryCode == "07W518"
def currencyCode = parse.chargesAndFees.currencyCode log.info currencyCode assert currencyCode == "USD"
